text: Mario Vasilj (born 23 December 1983) is a retired Swedish football defender. He is currently the head coach of Östers IF's U21 team and assistant manager of the club's first team. ==Career== He joined Östers IF in 2006 from amateur side Rydaholms GoIF.Äntligen gör Öster mål igen During his first season at Öster, he was regularly left out of the team for other players, but when he has played, his performances have been impressive considered his lack of experience. During Östers successful 2010 campaign to win Division 1 Södra, he played every single minute of the season up until the 23rd round,Spelprogram – Div 1 Södra, herrar when he tore a PCL.Vasilj och Bojent är redo för spel After 12 long years, Vasilj finally left Östers IF after the 2018 season.Fina hyllningar till Mario Vasilj, ostersif.se, 10 November 2018 ==Coaching career== After a season with Rydaholms GoIF in 2019, Vasilj decided to retire at the end of the year. On 29 January 2020, he returned to Östers IF as an assistant coach for the first team and head coach of the club's U21 team.Mario Vasilj blir ny assisterande tränare, ostersif.se, 21 January 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Östers IF players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Superettan players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swedish football managers Category:Östers IF non- playing staff
title: Mario Vasilj
